name: Fire Doodle Lite
description:
The official FREE version of Fire Doodle is finally here! Fire Doodle Lite allows you to easily create drawing with relaxing flame burning effect. Draw on your iPhone, iPad or iPod with Fire Doodle, then tap the Fire button and watch your doodle turning into fantastic burning art!

Let Fire Doodle bring you the heated atmosphere and warm your soul in those relaxing night time. You can even save your Fire doodle to photo albums and share.

KEY FEATURES:
* Relaxing animated flame effect*
* Fantastic Fire Glow Effect
* Auto-hiding toolbar (auto-hide while drawing)
* Erase the previous stroke (by pressing the undo button)
* Save drawing to Photo Albums to share


USEFUL TIPS:
* Tap the fire button to toggle flame animation on/off. Animated fire may take a couple of seconds to stop.
** You cannot drawing while in fire effect. Tap the "Draw" or "Clear" button to leave the fire effect and start drawing again
